tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was extremely nervous at the beginning of my root canal surgery specially due to the phobia I developed around it after going through several fancy clinics in and around Bangalore. However I decided to go ahead with Dr Raghunandan after going through the reviews and trust me, this has been the best decision ever. He is simply a magician who is extremely good at his craft and before you even know the treatment would be over.He is assisted by his wife Mrs Mallika who is equally good. Both of them are extremely good at comforting a patient as well. So you can trust them without any doubt. Thank you Dr. Raghunandan and Dr Mallika.
reply_text: Thank you very much, sir for your extremely favourable and detailed feedback. Your appreciation  helps us and motivates us to serve even better in future also  Thank you.üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: RCT is one procedure that even bravest of us will be anxious about, I was no different. I visited the clinic with a fear filled heart and during 1st visit I was almost in tears out of fear and anxiety as my earlier experiences with many dentists were not so pleasant, however except the pain of local anesthesia I didn't experience any other pain and could come back for 2nd visit without any worry. I want to thank Dr Raghunandana and his wife Mallika who were a great support during the entire procedure. his clinic is filled with all updated equipments which guarantee best treatment. Their friendliness and meticulous treatment helped me smile again.
reply_text: Thank you very much mam for a very detailed feedback. It also needs cooperation also from the patient for us to deliver good work . We really appreciate that in spite of your anxiety towards dental procedures, u too cooperated quite well,hence result was very good.Once again thank you, mam.

context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: Visited Dr Raghunandan for my RCT & complete treatment with Tooth cap wherein he's an expert in complete dentistry with vast knowledge and find him reading / referring manuals n books regds to dentistry and every hungry for more advanced methods in surgery, etc**** **** *** ******* ** **** ************ ** **** ***** *** gives complete history about the problem n cure and has been a very big bonus for the clinic while taking care of all the Op's n helping Dr from the word Go!! They take care of every minute issues and have a cure for itüëçWhen I last visited for my tooth cap I met Dr Shreyas who's the son of Dr Raghunandan & is also keen to follow his Dad's noble footsteps.Totally a very comfortable experience and suggest anybody at any age to just walk upto Sanjeevini & walk out totally satisfiedüëç
reply_text: Thank you very much Mr. Raj Shastry for your very appreciating and elaborate feedback. üôèWe also appreciate your keen observation and   detailed  inputs u gave about our clinic. tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Root canal treatment was unattended for years. When pain started,  Dr. Raghunandana was approached immediately after relaxation of first lockdown during corona pandemic. The clinic was equipped and diligent with preventing corona spread. He followed a systematic approach based on x-ray, scanning reports. There were 4/5 canals atleast one a very difficult one to find and treat. The procedure took three sittings and painless during procedure. He used microscope to perform the procedure - a   newer and good experience
reply_text: Thank you very much sir for your valuable feedback

review:
Dr.Raghunandan is the most professional dentist around Vijaynagar. I have been consulting with him for the last 10 years. 

The whole process from initial consulting till the end of the treatment is always smooth. He explains in detail what the issue with our tooth is and also explains the procedure. 

This time I delayed my visit because of the Covid scare , but the clinic was super clean And in line with the new guidelines. Ma‚Äôam explained all the elaborate fumigation processes they undertake after each visit. 

You can trust their team , any day .
reply_text: Thank you very much mam for your and all your family  members continued trust in us.And also for taking your valuable time off  to give an elaborate feedback .
